column4: if you open up System>Preferences>Appearance...there should be a tab that says Visual Effects
yes I have that tab open
what do you get when you try and enable visual effects?
: When I try to enable visual efects in appearance I get "The composite extention is not available"...
have you installed xserver-xgl through apt-get or synaptics yet?

ok..for me..i had to use the restricted drivers and then after that, reboot, then install xserver-xgl via apt-get and then reboot...and then install the settings manager..and that was it...
What card do you have ?
the ATI Radeon Xpress 200M
what's the name of the settingsmanager, can yo uget it trough apt ?
yeah...hang on....i'll tell you
compizconfig-settings-manager

nope..it just started working for me....
how do you knwo it's working, do you have acommand that says something about xgl ?

good :)
yes, wobbly windows, no cube yet ...

mine wasn't either but i just figured it out.hehe..if you look in the bottom right corner (hope you're using GNOME) you should see your workspaces...i think default to Gutsy is 2..right click and go to preferences and change the columns to 4..so it shows 4 workspaces..then ur cube shold work properly
